attributes.action: Abolish the outdated House of Lords, there by privilege and birthright only.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.ipsos-mori.com/researchpublications/researcharchive/3013/Ipsos-MORI-House-of-Lords-reform-poll.aspx

http://ukpollingreport.co.uk/blog/archives/5702

http://survation.com/public-still-support-reform-for-house-of-lords/
attributes.background:
The House of Lords is an outdated section of Government which is only obtained by birth and privilege.
Lords sleeping on the bench shouldn't be paid for it when the decisions made affect millions of people's lives.
